div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.

tr.td: PAS constraints on the generic Claim/$submit operation

div.p: Profiles to be supported by EMRs and payor systems conforming to this implementation guide

tr.td: PAS constraints on Claim resource mandating support for elements relevant to the prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Claim resource when submitting an update to a previous PAS prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Claim resource mandating support for elements relevant to the response of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Organization resource mandating support for elements relevant to the requestor of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Organization resource mandating support for elements relevant to the Utilization Management Organization of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Organization resource mandating support for elements relevant to an Organization forming part of a Care Team for a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Practitioner resource mandating support for elements relevant to the requestor of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Practitioner resource mandating support for elements relevant to an Practitioner forming part of a Care Team for a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on PractitionerRole resource mandating support for elements relevant to the requestor of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Coverage resource mandating support for elements relevant to the insurance of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to the subscriber of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to the beneficiary of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Condition resource mandating support for elements relevant to the diagnosis of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Location resource mandating support for elements relevant to the of a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Timing datatype for elements relevant to a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on Encounter resource for elements relevant to a institutional claim for a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on DocumentReference resource for additional information sent with a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on ServiceRequest resource for service level event information sent with a prior authorization request
PAS constraints on CommunicationRequest resource for requesting additional information to be sent for a prior authorization request

div.p: Extensions defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Extension used on a Claim resource to identify when requested events will occur.
Extension used on a Claim resource to identify information about a hospital admission.
